import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { getInvoice } from "../requests/InvoiceRequest"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export function InvoiceDetailPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const [invoice, setInvoice] = useState(); useEffect(() => { const getDetails = async () => { try { const invoiceRes = await getInvoice(id ?? ""); console.log(invoiceRes); setInvoice(invoiceRes); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; getDetails(); }, [id]); return (
